replies.body: I saw this when watching the tournament and I had no idea what was happening. I asked around and there isn't an explanation as to why this happened. @__@

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=YpjTz8Eg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-16T21:56:26.496+0000)
>
> I saw this when watching the tournament and I had no idea what was happening. I asked around and there isn't an explanation as to why this happened. @__@

Happened to me with a Shen taunt a few patches ago, it might be some really rare taunt bug.
Okay, cool. Thanks for the heads up. We'll poke around with taunt and see if that's the case.
I had this happen against a jax. I used ult and he just walked out of it

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=YpjTz8Eg,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-15T02:01:03.777+0000)
>
> I had this happen against a jax. I used ult and he just walked out of it

happened to me multiple time

Yasuro pauses for a moment.  Can you Sash out of a taunt?

It looks like he uses an item or something

Originally I was under the same impression, however if you look above Yasuo's head, Galio's CC indicator is still animated and visible, meaning that it wasn't "cleansed" by Quicksilver Sash nor Mercurial Scimitar. Rather Yasuo simply denied Galio the time of day due to some bit of conflict within the coding. Probably having to deal with a bug in the Taunt's effective range, or the fact that Yasuo was already slowed and for whatever reason Galio's taunt didn't stack ontop of the slow, rather it just got pushed out of the way. If you look closely at the moment Galio Ults Yasuo twitches back to face Galio before continuing on with the preset pathing.
is it me or is that galio getting bigger during ult?
Taunts as a whole feels broken, Rammus is also suffering
